title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, September 30, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of W.S. Merwin (1927-2019), who in the poem “Place,” wrote, “On the last day of the world / I would want to plant a tree.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of W.S. Merwin (1927-2019), who in the poem “Place,” wrote, “On the last day of the world / I would want to plant a tree.”
